about_the_game: Experience the beautiful music of Aspire: Ina's Tale through the official soundtrack, which comes with all 26 original tracks from the game plus 3 bonus tracks. Kick back and relax among a multitude of musical genres and styles, including an orchestra and traditional Asian ethnic instruments blended with synthesized and mystical sounds.
detailed_description: Experience the beautiful music of Aspire: Ina's Tale through the official soundtrack, which comes with all 26 original tracks from the game plus 3 bonus tracks. Kick back and relax among a multitude of musical genres and styles, including an orchestra and traditional Asian ethnic instruments blended with synthesized and mystical sounds.
